Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
After that, the same exchange happened at the supermarket.
It's so awkward, I probably won't be able to go back to that shopping street for a while.
...Though, if you're going to talk about the cute things about cats, I suppose.
Vanilla: "Hmm? Sniff, sniff... "
Vanilla: "I smell something really good from over there."
Chocola: "You're right! It smells really savory and nice, Master!"
Kashou: "Indeed. This smell is..."
He turns his face in the direction of the scent.
Street vendor cat: "Welcome!"
Street vendor cat: "How about some delicious, freshly made takoyaki?"
Street vendor cat: "It's piping hot and full of bonito flakes! How about some?"
Chocola: "Wow, a cat takoyaki stand! That's rare, Master!"

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "To be a good girl!"
Shocola: "Shigure, you're harsh. But thanks to you, I've learned a lot."
Shopkeeper: "Is that so? You have a good master, don't you?"
Shocola: "Ah, but Master is Master!"
Shocola: "And Shigure is Shigure! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "To translate, Shigure is a very important friend."
Vanilla: "And you're the only one who can call him 'Master'."
Shopkeeper: "Ahaha. You're loved, aren't you, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, I'm grateful for that."
He's lightly nudged with an elbow.
He responds with a wry smile, feeling a bit embarrassed.
...It's a little embarrassing to admit outside.

[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」

As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
A crisp smile accompanies the offering of a delivery slip and pen.
Kashou: "That's right, um..."
He re-examines the delivery slip he received.
Kashou: "...Actually, it seems like it's not what I ordered."
[Dish Supplier]: "...Huh? Really?"
[Dish Supplier]: "Does that mean the items are different...?"
Kashou: "No, it seems like everything I ordered is included... but..."
He glances towards the cardboard boxes piled up inside the shop.
Cardboard boxes, stacks and stacks of them, filled the small shop.
In fact, the shop was almost entirely made of cardboard.
Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes..."
[Dish Supplier]: "I-I'm so sorry! I'll check with headquarters right away!"
[Dish Supplier]: "Could you please wait a moment!?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
[Dish Supplier]: "It seems there was a mix-up with another order due to our mistake..."
[Dish Supplier]: "Since you, Master, will likely need these soon..."
[Dish Supplier]: "If you don't mind, I was hoping you could just take the dishes for your order..."
[Kashou]: "You want me to just take the ordered dishes...?"
[Kashou]: "…Huh? From these?"
A towering stack of cardboard boxes loomed before him.
He couldn't help but stammer.
They were all uniformly the same box.
He wouldn't know what was inside until he opened them.
Moreover, looking at the way the invoices were marked, they were all top-grade tea sets and tableware.
Therefore, he'd have to be extremely careful handling them, or something terrible would happen.
[Kashou]: "Um, I would be happy if I could have them today too, since I also have preparations for opening..."
[Kashou]: "…Taking all of this now would take quite a while, wouldn't it?"

窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "...If I could live as simply as a cat, things would be a lot easier, I suppose."
He glanced at the name of the shop posted in the window.
He brushed off a wry smile and began to put away the newly arrived tea set.
Vanilla: "Huh? That takoyaki stand isn't here today."
It was the same park street as yesterday evening.
But there wasn't a food stall to be seen today.
Even though I wanted to send the cats back to their families, no one was here today.
I had also left the keys to my family home behind.
So I went shopping to kill time until Shigure returned.
Chocola: "...Huh? Oh, g-gomen Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it? Catnip, wasn't it?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」

[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」

Kashou: "Chocola, are you tired? Would you like to rest for a bit?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just a little..."
Chocola: "But it's alright. I'm sorry for worrying you, Master."
Kashou: "…It's not something to apologize for."
He gives a troubled smile and lowers his head.
He already knows the reason why she doesn’t have her energy.
That’s why he can only remain silent.
Kashou: "Well, there's a bench right there, so why don't you rest for a while?"
Vanilla: "Then, I'll go buy some drinks."
Kashou: "Ah, please do. For everyone."

The sea breeze whistles through the park's trees.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「形も揃って時間は容赦なく過ぎてくけど……」
今朝届いたばかりのショップカードに手を伸ばす。
[ショコラ]: 「にゃにゃにゃっ！？　ご主人さま、なんですか！　それはなんですかー！」
[バニラ]: 「おお。これはもしや、ショップカードというやつでは」
[ショコラ]: 「すごい、すごいですご主人さま！　お店の住所とか電話番号まで書いてますよー！」
[バニラ]: 「お店の情報がもろバレの一枚」
[バニラ]: 「個人情報保護にうるさい時代に危機感のない」
[嘉祥]: 「いやショップカードってそういうもんだから」
個人情報保護とか知ってるのにショップカードは知らないのか。
まぁ確かに変な営業とか来たら面倒だけども。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Time did fly by when we were trying to get everything prepared though...」
I reached for the business cards that had just arrived that morning.
[Chocola]: 「Meow meow meow?! Master, what are those?! Just what could those be?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohh. Could those be those things called "business cards?"」
[Chocola]: 「Amazing! That's amazing, Master! It even has the shop's address and phone number on it!」
[Vanilla]: 「It's a single card that tells you everything about this shop.」
[Vanilla]: 「You have no sense of discretion in an era where everyone is protective of their privacy.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that's exactly what business cards are used for.」
She knew about protecting personal information, but not about business cards...?
Well, it was true that it would be a pain if I was in some sort of strange business or something.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Even as time relentlessly passes, with things falling into place..."
He reaches for the shop card that arrived this morning.
Chocola: "Nya nya nya!? Master, what is that! What is it!?"
Vanilla: "Oh. Could this be a shop card?"
Chocola: "Amazing, it's amazing, Master! It even has the store's address and phone number!"
Vanilla: "A card that reveals all the store's information."
Vanilla: "It's shockingly careless in an age where people are very strict about protecting personal information."
Kashou: "Well, shop cards are just like that."
Even though he knows about protecting personal information, he doesn't know about shop cards.
Though, it would be troublesome if strange sales tactics came along.

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「……やっぱりネコなんだなぁ」
普通の猫用のオモチャに夢中になってる二匹を見て実感。
まぁご自由にって書いてあるし、とりあえずほっとこう。
[嘉祥]: 「えーと、ネコ関係の本はどこだろうな……」
店内を見渡しているとエプロンを付けた店員さんが近寄って来てくれる。
[店員]: 「何かお探しですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ネコの飼い方の本とかってありますか？　人型ネコの」
[店員]: 「はい、もちろんございますよ。こちらになります」
[嘉祥]: 「……ずいぶんたくさんあるんですね、ネコの本って」
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「...... Meow! Fwahp!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow! Meow, meow meow, meow meow!! (Fwahp fwahp!)」
[Kashou]: 「... You two really are cats.」
That was how I felt, watching those two get so engrossed in a regular cat toy.
Well, it did say "Go Ahead," so for now, I'll just let them play with it.
[Kashou]: 「Hmm, where can I find books on catgirls...」
As I looked around the store, an apron-clad shop clerk came up to me.
[Shop Clerk]: 「Is there anything I can help you with?」
[Kashou]: 「Do you have any books on raising cats? The humanoid kind.」
[Shop Clerk]: 「Yes, certainly! They would be over here.」
[Kashou]: 「... Wow, there sure are a lot of books on catgirls.」
ModelAnswer:
Vanilla: "Nya! (snap!)"
Vanilla & Chocola: "Nya nyaa! Nya nya nya nya nyaa!! (snap, snap)"
Kashou: "…As expected, they're cats."
I realize it as I watch the two of them engrossed in a toy for ordinary cats. Well, it says 'feel free', so I'll just leave them be for now.
Kashou: "Um, I wonder where the books about cats are… "
As I look around the store, a store clerk wearing an apron approaches me.
Clerk: "Can I help you find something?"
Kashou: "Do you have any books on how to care for cats? Specifically, humanoid cats."
Clerk: "Yes, of course. They're over here."
Kashou: "…There are quite a lot of books about cats, aren't there?"

Question:
[時雨？]: 「商売とは稼げる時には非情にでも稼がねば成り立たぬのです！」
[時雨？]: 「それに兄さまにそんな冷たい目で見られたら悲しい！　悲しいのです！」

[嘉祥]: 「だから選り好みとかじゃなくてだな……」
泣きが入って来た上にキャラがブレブレ。
何が言いたいのかまったくわからない。
[ショコラ]: 「あ、時雨ちゃんだー！　久しぶりー♪　元気にしてたー！？」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、何その格好？　流行ってるの？」

reference_answer:
[Shigure?]: 「When it comes to business, you won't get anywhere if you don't jump at every opportunity to make money!」
[Shigure?]: 「Besides, to see Nii-sama give me such a cold look is making me sad! I'm sad!」
[Shigure?]: 「And after I held back until today to do something to help you too...! Uuuu...!!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, I'm not being picky here...」
Not only had she now burst into tears, but her façade was in shambles.
I had no clue what to say.
[Chocola]: 「Ah, Shigure-chan~! It's been a while~ ♪ How have you been~?!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure, what's with that outfit? Is that what people are wearing now?」

[Shigure?]: 「Ah, stop! Don't pull on my cloak... ahh, ah... wait.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure?: "Business is about ruthlessly earning when you can! It's how things succeed!"
Shigure?: "And I'd be sad to be looked at with such cold eyes by you, Onii-sama! I'm sad!"
Shigure?: "I've endured all this time hoping I could be of some help... Uuuh...!!"
Kashou: "So, it's not about being picky, you know..."
She's getting emotional and her character is all over the place.
I have absolutely no idea what she's trying to say.
Chocola: "Oh, Shigure-chan! Long time no see~! How have you been!?"
Vanilla: "Shigure, what's with that outfit? Is it trendy?"
Shigure?: "Hey! I am not Shigure-chan!"
Shigure?: "Ah, wait, let me pull back this cloak... Ah, uh... Whoa!"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「シナモンもココナツも、余計な心配掛けてすまなかったな」
[嘉祥]: 「もう今後はこんなことしないから勘弁してくれ」
シナモンとココナツにも頭を下げる。
こうやって実家のネコが全員来てくれて。
今は本当に家族の暖かみがありがたく思える。
[時雨]: 「お父さまの耳には入らないようにしておきますので、ご安心下さい」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。お前には色々と気苦労掛けてすまないな」
[時雨]: 「そんなことは何も」
[時雨]: 「私はいつでも兄さまを見て来ましたし、これからも応援していますから」
小さな両手で俺の手をそっと包んでくれる。
黙って出て行ったことなど一言も口にしないまま。
ただ許してくれるように。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Cinnamon, Coconut, I'm sorry to have worried you guys, too.」
[Kashou]: 「It won't happen again, so please cut me some slack.」
I lowered my head towards Cinnamon and Coconut.
And just like that, all the catgirls in my family were assembled.
I appreciated the warmth of having my family here right now.
[Shigure]: 「I won't let Father know about this, so please don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, I appreciate it. You've been through a lot, too. Sorry.」
[Shigure]: 「It was nothing.」
[Shigure]: 「I will always come and visit you, Nii-sama. I'll be cheering you on.」
She wrapped her small hands around my hand.
She didn't say anything about me slipping out without telling anyone.
She simply just forgave me.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Shinnamon and Coconut, I apologize for causing you unnecessary worry."
Kashou: "I won't do anything like this again, so please forgive me."
He bows his head to Shinnamon and Coconut.
It's wonderful that all the cats from my family came to see me like this.
Right now, I'm truly grateful for the warmth of my family.
Shigure: "I'll make sure Father doesn't hear about this, so please don't worry."
Kashou: "Ah, I'm counting on you. I apologize for all the trouble I've caused you."
Shigure: "It's nothing at all."
Shigure: "I've always watched over you, Onii-sama, and I'll continue to support you."
She gently wraps her small hands around my own.
Without saying a word about leaving silently, she just hopes I'll forgive her.

There was a lot of similar equipment, of course, but there were minute differences.
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, this is where you make cakes, isn't it?」

Of course, there are many of the same things, but there are often subtle differences.

[時雨]: 「許可証なく外を歩いたりしたらば、ネコは警察に補導されてしまいますから」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「But if you're going to get them working in this bakery, certain qualifications are necessary.」
[Kashou]: 「Qualifications? Are you talking about a cooking certification?」
[Shigure]: 「Teehee~ Not that, Nii-sama. It isn't that...」
[Shigure]: 「Regarding, allowing catgirls to work independently as employees...」
[Shigure]: 「A catgirl needs to have an "Independent Action Permit" in terms of qualifications.」
[Shigure]: 「Without that permit, a catgirl can be arrested by the police if they are out and about.」
[Shigure]: 「Besides, they can't be employed without that permit.」
[Shigure]: 「Working for free is a different story, though.」
[Kashou]: 「A permit... but our family's catgirls have never had one of those when they leave home, right?」
I tried to remember the times when our family's catgirls went out while under Shigure's watch.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "But if you're going to have them work at the shop, you'll need to make sure they obtain the proper qualifications."
Kashou: "Qualifications? You mean a cook's license?"
Shigure: "Hehe. No, not that, Onii-sama. Don't you see?"
Shigure: "To allow a cat to act independently or be treated as an employee... "
Shigure: "A special permit called a Solo Activity Permit is required for the cat."
Shigure: "If a cat goes outside without a permit, it will be reported to the police and guided home."
Shigure: "And they can't be used as employees without one."
Shigure: "It's a different story for just free help, though."
Kashou: "A permit? Even the cats at home didn't have something like that when they went outside, did they?"
He recalls the times the house cats went out on Shigure's errands.

... It seemed that selling out and closing early on opening day actually got us noticed.

You could argue that it was just a big coincidence, but this was definitely all because of Shigure.

Shigure: "Oh? What are you talking about?"
I decided not to press the matter further, and Shigure responded with a small smile and a tilt of her head.
If she wasn't going to answer honestly, she would have just said it directly.
That's just the kind of Shigure she's always been.
Shigure: "I understand what you're saying, Onii-sama, but..."
Shigure: "Cats are clever creatures, you know. They can become family and partners to humans."
Shigure: "…That's why"
She paused for a moment, then looked at me with a troubled smile.
Shigure: "…I think it must be lonely that you won't rely on me?"
That smile made my chest ache.

reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
She frowned, looking at her phone screen.
Kashou watched Shigure, who didn't move, and guessed the caller ID.
[Kashou]: "It's probably from your family, right? You need to answer quickly."
[Shigure]: "…I understand even without knowing the reason for the call. You left without telling me where you were going."
The ringing on Shigure’s phone stopped.
Similarly, Shigure remained silent,
clenching the phone tightly in her hand.
[Shigure]: "…Is it because I'm still so young?"
[Shigure]: "Or because I'm naive?"
[Shigure]: "…So I must obey my father and mother's wishes?"
[Shigure]: "…I want to be here."
[Shigure]: "Even just to be by your side when my brother is suffering… at least, to be near him…"

reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.

[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」

[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.

Vanilla: "But, I can't just go home like this... what should I do..."
She grips Chocola's hand tightly, filled with anxiety.
She looks up at the cold shutter and bites her lower lip.

Chocola: "My master is in terrible condition! So, I was trying to call a doctor!"
Vanilla: "The hospitals are closed, and I don't know what to do..."

Police Officer: "What about your bell? Don't you have it?"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Ah..."
They both put their hands to their necks, prompted by the question.

何とかそれだけを口にする。

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
This morning's unexpected sight really knocked me off my feet.
Shigure: "Good morning, Onii-sama."
Shigure: "I've been thinking about this whole incident."
A bright, carefree smile, without a single cloud in the sky.
The other cats are smiling at me the same way.
I felt cold sweat trickle down my back as
Kashou: "Hah... Thinking about it, what exactly...?"
I managed to get those words out.
Shigure: "Through this incident, I've come to realize that it's impossible to not make you overwork yourself, Onii-sama."
Shigure: "But, as your little sister, it's also true that I was kept up at night worrying so much... "
Shigure: "Therefore, Shigure thinks the best course of action is to increase the staff and reduce your burden, Onii-sama."
Kashou: "......Hah."

Question:

reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」

[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I said only that and left Minaduki's house, as if I were fleeing.
All sorts of things were running through my head, and my thoughts became jumbled.
When I realized it, I was in a park at night.
[Kashou]: "Ah..."
I had put everything – the house key, my wallet – into my bag and left them behind.
[Kashou]: "...What am I doing?"

[Kashou]: "Chocola...!"
[Vanilla]: "Master, you forgot something."
In Vanilla's hands was my bag.
[Kashou]: "You brought this, Vanilla?"
[Vanilla]: "Of course. Sleeping outdoors is inconvenient."
[Kashou]: "Well, yes."
Without the key, not only I but also the two of us couldn't get into the house.

Vanilla: "There's a vending machine over there. I'm going to get you a warm drink. It's going to be cold tonight."
Kashou: "...Alright."
She mentioned a reward, but... Vanilla is going to buy me a warm drink.
I hadn't realized how cold I had become.
Vanilla: "Here you go, Master."
Kashou: "Thank you, Vanilla."
I accepted the canned coffee she bought for me.

While I think she's exaggerating like crazy, I decide to take Shigure up on her support.

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
I need to ask my supplier something. It's not urgent, but I should call them soon.
It's probably normal for a privately-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with each of my suppliers myself.
There are farmers who will sell ingredients that aren't generally distributed if you buy a large quantity.
The search for flavor was a journey to find ingredients.
It would be inappropriate to talk about business when everyone is enjoying the sightseeing, so I told them I had personal matters and left the room.
I decided to leave the inn as well and talk in a quiet place, just in case.
I make the call.
[Kashou]: "Bonjour, this is Kashou Minaduki from La Soleil Japon. Could I speak with Mr. James Carter?"
[Kashou]: "Phew..."
They were surprised to hear an order from overseas, but they seem to be able to ship it after all.
I return inside the inn.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Maple (メイプル) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Azuki (アズキ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「シナモンが呼んでるとか、嘘じゃない！」
これがバニラの本気か。恐ろしい。
[バニラ]: 「ふぅ……負けを認めないとは」
[メイプル]: 「フキーッ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「は、はは……まぁ、ほどほどに、仲良くな？」
俺は卓球台から離れ、別の場所へ向かった。
ゲームコーナーで、アズキとシナモンを見つけた。この２匹の組み合わせも、けっこう珍しい気がする。
[シナモン]: 「わうっ！　ひゃうっ！？　あっ、あっ！　やっ！」
アズキは黙々と操作し、その後ろで見ているだけのシナモンが、身体を左右に揺らしつつ、奇妙な声をあげていた。
[シナモン]: 「あっ、だめ！　はうっ……あっ、んんっ、きゃふっ！？」
[嘉祥]: 「なにやってるんだ？」
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「You lied by telling me Cinnamon was calling!」
So this is how Vanilla plays 'for real', huh? Scary stuff.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmph... You're a sore loser.」
[Maple]: 「Arghhh!!」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hahah... Now there, let's try to get along, okay?」
I leave the ping-pong table and head someplace else.
I find Azuki and Cinnamon in the game corner. I feel like seeing these two together is pretty rare, too.
[Cinnamon]: 「Waah! Haah-ngh! Ah, aah! Yah!!」
Azuki is playing silently while Cinnamon is watching from behind, rocking her body from side to side and letting out bizarre yelps.
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah! Don't! Ha-ngh... Ah! Mm! Kya-fhh?!」
[Kashou]: 「What are you doing?」
ModelAnswer:
Maple: "Cinnamon is calling you, it's not a lie!"
This is Vanilla's serious expression. How terrifying.
Vanilla: "Phew... You won't admit defeat, huh?"
Maple: "Pfft!?"
Kashou: "Hah ha ha... Well, be reasonable and get along."
I got up from the ping pong table and headed somewhere else.
I found Azuki and Cinnamon at the game corner. I feel like this combination of the two is pretty rare.
Cinnamon: "Whoa! Eeeek!? Oh, oh! Gotcha!"
Azuki was operating the controls silently, while Cinnamon, watching from behind, was shaking her body from side to side and making strange noises.
Cinnamon: "Oh no! Eek... Oh, umm, kyaah!?"
Kashou: "What are you doing?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[ショコラ]: 「はむはむ……おまんじゅう、おーいしー」
[ココナツ]: 「もぐもぐ……これが、伝説の温泉まんじゅうなんだね！」
[ショコラ]: 「甘い。おいしい。甘い」
[ココナツ]: 「なるほど……これは……最高に美味しい！」
[嘉祥]: 「おいおい……」
[ショコラ]: 「あっ、ご主人さま！」
[ココナツ]: 「お兄ちゃん！」
[ショコラ]: 「もう用事はいいんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、終わったよ」
[嘉祥]: 「こんな時間にまんじゅうを食べてたら、夕飯が入らなくなるぞ？」
[ショコラ]: 「うっ……！！」
[ココナツ]: 「それは、その……」
[ショコラ]: 「実は、やむににゃまれぬ深い理由がありまして……」
[嘉祥]: 「ほう？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「Om, om... Manju buns are so yummy!」
[Coconut]: 「Omf, omf... So these are the legendary hot-spring manju buns!」
[Chocola]: 「So sweet. So yummy. So sweet.」
[Coconut]: 「I see... This is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「Hey, hey...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, Master!」
[Coconut]: 「Onii-chan!」
[Chocola]: 「Are you done with your business?」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I'm all done.」
[Kashou]: 「You know, if you eat manju now, you're not going to have room for dinner.」
[Chocola]: 「Urk...!」
[Coconut]: 「Well, you see...」
[Chocola]: 「There is a deep and catpelling reason for all this...」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, which is?」
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "Nom nom... this manju is delicious!"
Coconut: "Munch munch... So, this is the legendary hot spring manju!"
Chocola: "Sweet. Delicious. Sweet."
Coconut: "I see... This is... incredibly delicious!"
Kashou: "Whoa there..."
Chocola: "Oh, Master!"
Coconut: "Onii-chan!"
Chocola: "Are you finished with your business now?"
Kashou: "Yeah, I am."
Kashou: "If you eat manju at this hour, you'll spoil your dinner, you know?"
Chocola: "Ugh...!!"
Coconut: "Well, it's just that..."
Chocola: "Actually, there's a very compelling reason why I couldn't help myself..."
Kashou: "Oh?"

metadata:
[character] Name: Coconut (ココナツ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うむ」
[ショコラ]: 「ちょうど、温まったところで」
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど」
[ショコラ]: 「美味しそうだったんです！」
[嘉祥]: 「そうか」
やむにやまれぬことも、深くもない理由だった。
[ココナツ]: 「ごめんなさい。ぼくが食べたいって言ったから」
[ココナツ]: 「ショコラは我慢してたんだけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「ココナツは温泉まんじゅうを１つくらい食べても、夕飯を残さないだろうしな」
[ココナツ]: 「あ、うん」
[ココナツ]: 「実は、もう１０個目なんだけど……」
おいおい……
しかし、叱るようなことでもないか……
[嘉祥]: 「そんなに美味しいのか？」
[ココナツ]: 「え？　あ、うん！　すっごく！」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Uh-huh?」
[Chocola]: 「They were warmed up just right...」
[Kashou]: 「Right.」
[Chocola]: 「And they looked delicious!」
[Kashou]: 「I see.」
It's neither a deep nor compelling reason at all.
[Coconut]: 「I'm sorry. It's because I said I wanted to have some.」
[Coconut]: 「Chocola tried her best to contain herself, but...」
[Kashou]: 「I assume that one tiny little hot-spring manju probably wouldn't spoil your appetite for dinner, Coconut.」
[Coconut]: 「Oh, yeah.」
[Coconut]: 「Truth is, I've already had ten...」
For crying out loud, girl...
Still, this probably isn't worth scolding them over...
[Kashou]: 「Are they really that good?」
[Coconut]: 「Huh? Oh, yeah! Really good!」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Hmm."
Chocola: "It just warmed up nicely."
Minaduki Kashou: "I see."
Chocola: "It looked delicious!"
Minaduki Kashou: "Is that so?"
It was a reason that arose from a deep-seated impulse, though not particularly profound.
Coconut: "I'm sorry. It's because I said I wanted to eat them."
Coconut: "Chocola was holding back..."
Minaduki Kashou: "Coconut, you can eat just one or two onsen manju and still finish your dinner, right?"
Coconut: "Ah, yeah."
Coconut: "Actually, this is my tenth one..."
Oh dear...
But it's not really something to scold about...
Minaduki Kashou: "It's that delicious?"
Coconut: "Huh? Ah, yeah! It's really, really good!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Alright, let's try one."
I bought a hot spring manju at the food stall.
It's piping hot, fresh off the grill.
When I bit into it, it was plump and had a moister texture than I expected.
The sweet bean paste crumbled on my tongue, spreading its sweetness.
Kashou: "I see... hohoh... this is delicious."
The Western-style sweets I make, and the Japanese sweets from my family's shop, never have warm offerings.
Eating a hot manju while making little noises of enjoyment is a rather interesting experience.
Kashou: "Come to think of it, I've come to this hot spring town a few times... but I've never eaten one before."
That's because we didn't have cats back then.
Even when my parents, Shigure, and I went on trips together, we never talked about buying snacks.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
[element] Name: La Soleil (ラ・ソレイユ) | Type: Place
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Oh, Shigure, you're here. Were you busy with something?"
Shigure: "No, I'm all set now."
Kashou: "Perhaps you had a work call too?"
Shigure: "...Yes. I'm sorry. During this trip..."
Kashou: "Don't apologize. La Soleil is closed, but the rest of the world is a weekday, after all."
Although I haven't heard the details, Shigure apparently runs a company.
With that income, she buys clothes for the cats and has Rin take exams.
Father is strict with me, but lenient with my sister, Shigure. It seemed he lets her do as she pleases with the cats and her business.
Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves to their hearts' content. Playing table tennis, games... even the shop."

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[時雨]: 「それはよかったです。……兄様、たまには兄妹水入らずで遊びませんか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いいけど、何する？」
[時雨]: 「カラオケルームがあるそうですよ？」
[嘉祥]: 「カラオケか……高校時代に、ちょっと行ったきりだな。時雨、歌えるのか？」
[時雨]: 「幼少期に合唱をやっていましたから、少しは」
そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」
[時雨]: 「はぁ～、ひさしぶりに大きな声を出しました」
[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」
はっきり言って、プロ並だった。俺は惜しみない拍手を送る。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "That's good to hear. ...Brother, won't you play with me, just the two of us, sometime?"
Kashou: "Okay, but what do we do?"
Shigure: "I heard there's a karaoke room?"
Kashou: "Karaoke... It's been a while since I last went, back in high school. Shigure, can you sing?"
Shigure: "I did choir when I was little, so I can manage a little."
And so it was decided.
Shigure: "Then, with my feelings for you, brother... "
As she began to sing, the atmosphere completely changed.
Shigure: "～～～♪"
Kashou: "…Amazing."
Shigure: "Haa~, it's been a while since I shouted so loudly."
Kashou: "You're incredibly good! Honestly, you're professional-level!"
I sent her enthusiastic applause without hesitation.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「そんなに兄様に褒めていただけるなんて……幸福の極みです」
[時雨]: 「私の歌が、兄様に喜んでいただけるなんて……この声が……兄様の記憶に……はぁ、はぁ……」
[時雨]: 「うっ……鼻血が……」
[嘉祥]: 「お、おい、大丈夫か？」
[時雨]: 「ううぅ……よろしければ、次は兄様が歌ってくださいまし」
[嘉祥]: 「うっ……わ、わかった」
２人でカラオケに来て、歌わないというわけにもいかないか。抜群に上手い時雨のあとでは、つらいものがあるが……
[嘉祥]: 「えーっと……新しめの曲だと、留学してたときに覚えたやつが……」
リストを探してみる。
[嘉祥]: 「あれ？　見つからないな……ほどほどにヒット曲だと思うんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I never expected you to give me such ample praise... I am absolutely thrilled.」
[Shigure]: 「To think that my singing could delight you so much... This voice... is in your memories... Hah, hah...」
[Shigure]: 「Urk... I feel a nosebleed coming on...」
[Kashou]: 「H-Hey, are you all right?」
[Shigure]: 「Unghh... If it is not too much to ask, would you sing a song next?」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... O-Okay, fine.」
The two of us are here to do some karaoke, so I very well can't NOT sing, huh? Though, going up after an excellent singer like Shigure does load on the pressure...
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... For newish songs, there's that one I learned back when I was studying abroad...」
I search the list.
[Kashou]: 「Huh? I can't find it... I thought it was more or less a hit song, too...」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "To be praised by you like this... it's the happiest feeling."
Shigure: "My song... to be enjoyed by you... this voice of mine... in your memories... haa, haa..."
Shigure: "Ugh... I'm bleeding from my nose..."
Kashou: "O-hey, are you alright?"
Shigure: "Uuu... if you don't mind, perhaps next, you could sing, Master."
Kashou: "Ugh... w-w-okay."
We came to karaoke together, so we can't really not sing, can we? After Shigure's incredibly impressive performance, it's tough to follow...
Kashou: "Um... a newer song... one I learned when I was studying abroad..."
He starts searching through the list.
Kashou: "Huh? I can't find it... It's a fairly popular song, I think...?"

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「うん。メロディが綺麗なんだよ」
[時雨]: 「世界的に有名な曲でもなければ、海外の曲は収録されていないかと」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、そうか！」
結局、高校時代に流行っていた曲をうろ覚えで歌った。
[時雨]: 「兄様の歌声、とっても素敵でした」
[一同]: 「いただきますにゃ！いただきますいただきます！いただきますいただきます～！いただきまーす！いただきます」
[ショコラ]: 「ご馳走ですね、ご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、美味しそうだ」
[ココナツ]: 「ふぁー、お刺身、美味しいー！」
[バニラ]: 「素晴らしい。１００点満点のうちの１兆点」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Mm-hmm. It has a beautiful melody.」
[Shigure]: 「Unless it is a song that has international fame, I do not believe they would have a foreign song in their database.」
[Kashou]: 「Aah, you don't say!」
In the end, I sing a song that was popular back in my high school days, faintly remembering the lyrics.
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama, your singing was exquisite.」
[Everyone]: 「Time fur eating!Time to eat.Let's chow down!Time to eat.Let's dig in~!Food time!Yes, let us partake.」
[Chocola]: 「This is a regular feast, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, looks good.」
[Coconut]: 「Fwah, the sashimi is so good!」
[Vanilla]: 「Incredible. One-trillion points out of a hundred.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Yeah. The melody is beautiful."
Shigure: "It's probably not a world-famous song, and there aren't any overseas tracks included, though."
Kashou: "Ah, I see!"
In the end, he sang a song that was popular during high school, but he was singing it from memory.
Shigure: "Onii-sama's singing voice was wonderful."
Everyone: "Let's eat! Let's eat, let's eat! Let's eat, let's eat~! Let's eat!"
Chocola: "This is a feast, Master!"
Kashou: "Ah, it looks delicious."
Coconut: "Faa, the sashimi is delicious!"
Vanilla: "Wonderful. A 1 trillion out of 100 points."

metadata:

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「フカヒレの煮物ですね」
[メイプル]: 「ああ、これが」
[シナモン]: 「ふかひれって～？」
[メイプル]: 「サメの鰭のことよ」
[シナモン]: 「サメ～！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ふぁ～、いい香り！　ご主人さま、これ何でしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「えっと……松茸の茶碗蒸しだな。入っている白身は……ノドグロかな？」
[メイプル]: 「ニオイだけでわかったの！？　このお品書きを見たのではなくて……？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、お品書きは、そこにあったのか」
[嘉祥]: 「こういう料理は、香りでわかりやすいよ。ソースやケチャップがたっぷりかかってるようなメニューは難しいけどな」
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「That would be simmered shark fin.」
[Maple]: 「Aah, this is?」
[Cinnamon]: 「What's a 'shark fin'~?」
[Maple]: 「That pointy thing on a shark's back.」
[Cinnamon]: 「On a shark's back~?!」
[Chocola]: 「Fwah~ Such a great aroma! Master, what is this?」
[Kashou]: 「Um, let's see... That's a matsutake mushroom chawanmushi. It's a savory egg custard, and it's filled with... blackthroat fish, I think?」
[Maple]: 「You can tell just from the smell? You didn't look at the menu here...?」
[Kashou]: 「O-Oh, there was a menu?」
[Kashou]: 「With this kind of cuisine, it's easy to tell by the aroma. It's harder to do that with a menu consisting of stuff covered in sauce or ketchup, though.」
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "It's braised shark fin."
Maple: "Ah, yes, this is it."
Cinnamon: "Shark fin...?"
Maple: "It's from a shark."

Question:

[アズキ]: 「嘉祥の今までのことって？」
[嘉祥]: 「……大学卒業後に、俺はフランス留学をした」
[嘉祥]: 「卒業して、何の選択肢もなく家業を継ぐのが、どうにも釈然としなくて。自分の見識を広げたかったんだ」

reference_answer:
[Azuki]: 「Because you didn't put on outside shoes. That's not normal for a walk this late at night, don't you think?」
[Kashou]: 「Sorry... I really just needed to clear my head.」
[Azuki]: 「Are the convenience store sweets still what's buggin' you?」
[Kashou]: 「No, no. I'm good on that front now.」
[Kashou]: 「It's just that I've been thinking back on everything up till now... and I'm almost positive that there's something I'm still lacking.」
[Azuki]: 「What's 'everything up till now' for you, exactly?」
[Kashou]: 「...After I graduated college, I studied abroad in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Graduating and taking over the family business with no other options on the table wasn't satisfactory to me in the least. I wanted to broaden my horizons.」
[Kashou]: 「I don't want you to get the wrong impression, though... It's not like I hate the Minaduki's Japanese-style sweets, got it?」
ModelAnswer:
Azuki: "You didn't have your outdoor shoes on. That's not normal, is it, to be out this late at night?"
Kashou: "I'm sorry... I really needed a change of pace."
Azuki: "Are you still worried about the convenience store sweets?"
Kashou: "No, no, I'm definitely over that."
Kashou: "I was just reminiscing about the past... and wondering what's missing from me."
Azuki: "What about your past?"
Kashou: "...After graduating from university, I went to France."
Kashou: "After graduation, I felt a sense of dissatisfaction at the thought of inheriting the family business without any other options. I wanted to broaden my horizons."
Kashou: "Don't misunderstand me, though... I don't dislike Minadzuki's wagashi."

Cinnamon: "Good night, Kashou-san~"
Maple: "Since we went to all that trouble for you, you better sleep soundly, you hear?"

How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.

[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」

The number of dishes served varies from family to family, though.

[Beignet]: 「I see... So, this is the type of girl Shigure is. I'm glad I've gotten to meet her.」
ModelAnswer:

Shigure: "Ugh……I'm so happy, I think I'm going to faint."

[Kashou]: 「Is that how it works?」

[Shigure]: 「I open the windows, air out the inside, wipe down your desk, and check the comfort levels of your bed.」

Is there a need for a daily check of my bed's comfort levels...?

Kashou: "Is that so?"

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「I've been in this line of work for much longer, but you're way more diligent than I'll ever be.」
[Fraise]: 「You put painstaking detail into your work. I'd like to learn by your example.」
[Kashou]: 「Really?」
[Fraise]: 「Granted, I oftentimes see you space out...」
[Kashou]: 「Urk...」
[Fraise]: 「You have a lot of things on your mind that you need to sort out at the moment, right, Kashou-san?」
[Fraise]: 「Pâtissière told me some of the details.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, but that's still no reason to space out in the middle of work.」
[Fraise]: 「I will work to pick up the slack.」
[Kashou]: 「I'm not sure what I should say...」
I feel somewhere between apologetic and pathetic. Of course, I'm more grateful than anything, but that goes without saying.

俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。

[Beignet]: 「I don't think we'll have lines out the door again tomorrow.」
[Fraise]: 「Right... Tomorrow will just be Pâtissière and me.」
We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...

In the end, I still didn't realize what I was lacking.
Emotionally, I feel much relieved, though...

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「But after coming here and helping in the shop, I remembered something.」
[Kashou]: 「I really do want to make cakes that bring smiles to everyone's faces.」
[Kashou]: 「Mentor, your cakes are so good and have such a gentle flavor... that they bring smiles to people's faces.」

Minaduki Kashou: "Your cakes, Master, are so delicious, and have such a gentle taste... they make everyone happy."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Thank you very much.」
[Kashou]: 「Speaking of which, I've talked about my reasons for cake-making plenty of times, but... you've never talked about yours, have you, Mentor?」
[Beignet]: 「...That's right.」
[Kashou]: 「Well, when I asked you in the past, I remember you answered, 'I make cakes because I'm a pâtissière', but...」
[Beignet]: 「Hehe... Did I now?」
[Kashou]: 「In that case, what about your reasons for being a pâtissière in the first place?」
[Beignet]: 「...This pâtissièrie... has been making cakes since my grandmother's generation.」
[Beignet]: 「And while not to the extent of your family, I do think that it has a tradition that needs to be protected.」
ModelAnswer:

Minaduki Kashou: "Thank you."

Beignet: "…That's right."

Beignet: "Fufu... Was that what I said?"
Minaduki Kashou: "Then, what is the reason you became a patissier?"
Beignet: "…This shop has been in my family since my grandmother's time, and I've been making cakes ever since."
Beignet: "It's not as much as your family's tradition, but I feel like there's a tradition I need to protect."

I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...

I had been avoiding the topic of my family's wagashi shop being a long-established business, feeling it was out of place while apprenticing to learn Western sweets...

Question:

reference_answer:
[Beignet]: 「We married, and I gave birth to a son... For a while, the three of us lived together.」
[Beignet]: 「When we did... my son told me that... my sweets put a smile on everyone's face.」
[Beignet]: 「He told me, 'Mama, you're just like the sun'.」
[Beignet]: 「The reason why I named this shop 'La Soleil' is because of my son's words.」
[Kashou]: 「I see. So that's why...」
It fills me with joy to finally find out the origin behind the name La Soleil.
However, this story doesn't seem to be leading toward a happy ever after.
[Shigure]: 「...You loved your son... You loved your family, yes?」
[Beignet]: 「Yes, that goes without saying.」
[Beignet]: 「However, I was forced to leave Japan.」
[Beignet]: 「My older brother, who was supposed to take over this pâtissièrie, died an early death...」

Beignet: "Around that time... my son said that the sweets I made would make everyone smile."
Beignet: "He told me I was like the sun."
Beignet: "That's why I named this shop La Soleil."
Kashou: "I see, so that's the origin..."
I was happy to finally hear the story behind La Soleil.
But it didn't seem to be just a story of happiness.
Shigure: "…You loved your son…your family, didn't you?"
Beignet: "Yes, I did, truly."
Beignet: "But I had to leave Japan."
Beignet: "My older brother, who was supposed to inherit this shop, passed away too soon..."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「I don't think  what you did in the past was a mistake, but I do think it's a fact that you couldn't take your son's feelings into consideration at the time.」

[Beignet]: 「Isn't that just convenient wishful thinking?」

Beignet: "That's not a convenient fantasy for me, is it?"

Kashou: "I'm sorry for saying such things."

I stare at Shigure.

[Shigure]: 「Oh...」

[Kashou]: 「I don't think that I've ever been THAT heartless before. Actually, I just might dote a little too much...」
[Shigure]: 「Yes. Past and present, you've always been a kind and wonderful person.」
[Shigure]: 「But, in the past, I feel as though you wouldn't wait for me to say anything and you would just say, 'Hey, that looks heavy; I'll take that off your hands'.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, would I...?」

Kashou: "I don't think you were that heartless. Rather, you were overly solicitous..."
Shigure: "Yes. Both now and always, Onii-sama is very kind and wonderful."

Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:

[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "Wow, is this a Christmas present!? Thank you, Mother!"
Awayuki: "It might be a little early, but Kashou might get angry and leave again, you know?"
Shigure: "Ugh..."
Kashou: "No, that won't happen today! Please trust me."
Awayuki: "Yes, I trust you too, Kashou."
Kashou: "Ah, um... thank you."
Awayuki: "Go on, open it."
As she was told, I peeled off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
Kashou: "…A photo frame?"
It doesn't seem to have a photo in it.
Awayuki: "I thought it would be fun if you displayed one of our favorite memories from this year in your room?"
Come to think of it, Shigure gave Mother a photo frame for her birthday, because she had been wanting one.
